Hello,

does anyone know a mod that has small radially attachable ore tanks, about the size of the the long stock monoprop tanks ?

Thanx :-)

k

does anyone know a mod that has small radially attachable ore tanks, about the size of the the long stock monoprop tanks ?

Put this ModuleManager patch in a plain text file, save it as "radialoretank.cfg" anywhere in your GameData folder.


+PART[rcsTankRadialLong] {
	@name = radialOreTank
	@title = Small Radial Holding Tank
	@manufacturer = Jebediah Kerman's Junkyard and Spacecraft Parts Co
	@description = A small radially tank for storing raw materials, or possibly a light snack.
	@TechRequired = advScienceTech

	!RESOURCE{}

	RESOURCE {
	name = Ore
	amount = 0
	maxAmount = 60
	}	

	@MODULE {
	name = ModuleFuelJettison
	}
}

It clones the long monoprop tank and creates a new part that holds ore. Enjoy!
